translations: 发出大声；喊叫；鸣响（hoot 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He had the audience hooting with laughter.
The hooting of an owl came over the hill--ominous sound!
sentences.translation: 山那边传来猫头鹰的叫声——不吉利的声音！

sentences.sentence: The hooting of a tugboat adds its grave and tender note.
sentences.translation: 拖船的鸣笛声增添了它庄重而温柔的调子。
